prefixes.used_for: Authentication failures and credentials issues (login, SSO, token validation).
Multi-factor authentication setup, enforcement, and recovery.
Session lifecycle events such as expiry, invalidation, or CSRF failures.
Authorization denials due to missing privileges or scopes.
Role presence, mapping, and grant/revoke operations.
User/org/TMC/policy assignment and membership prerequisites.
Tenant state and lifecycle (inactive, suspended, not provisioned).
Organization discovery and validation (missing, mismatched, duplicated).
Licensing and subscription state (missing, expired, limits reached).
Commercial and vendor contracts (missing, expired, invalid terms).
Billing profile and account prerequisites.
Payment authorization, capture, settlement, and fraud checks.
Invoice lifecycle (missing, overdue, mismatch).
Tax configuration and jurisdiction rules.
Foreign exchange rates availability and conversion issues.
Generic request validation, schema, and semantic checks.
Traveler docs (passport, visa) and file uploads/verification.
Travel policy assignment, expiry, and violation handling.
Travel quote build, routing, and type selection errors.
Flight availability, seat map, fare rules, and ticketing prechecks.
Hotel availability, rate parity, and room/plan selection.
Hire car availability, class, depot constraints.
Train availability and routing.
Bus/coach availability and scheduling.
eSIM package selection and region support.
Activities, tours, and experiences capacity and timing.
PNR creation/update in GDS providers.
Ticketing issuance, reissue, and void failures.
Itinerary sync and traveler profile propagation.
Supplier search timeouts and filter inconsistencies.
Inventory staleness and cache invalidation issues.
Amadeus integration and upstream errors.
Sabre integration and upstream errors.
NDC API integration issues.
Payment gateway/provider availability and API errors.
Maps, geocoding, and place-resolution failures.
Email delivery and provider failures.
SMS delivery and credit/quota issues.
Mobile push registration and delivery failures.
Mobile-only flows: device registration, offline mode, app versioning.
File uploads to object storage or temporary stores.
File downloads and signed URL generation.
Unsupported formats, MIME/type validation.
Generic API contract/status errors (400/401/403/404/409/etc).
Webhook delivery, retries, and endpoint responses.
Idempotency key conflicts and duplicate submissions.

group: System, Infra, Config, DB, Cache, Queue, Rate Limiting

prefixes.used_for: Unhandled exceptions and generic server errors.
Missing or invalid configuration and feature flags.
Environment gating and dependency mismatches.
Database connectivity, timeouts, and migrations.
Cache availability and coherence errors.
Message broker publish/consume failures.
Rate limiting and quota enforcement.
Audit write/read failures and retention issues.
Policy and regulatory compliance checks and attestations.
Country/region support and geofence restrictions.
Traveler profile completeness and validation.
